price: Fir’awni waraana isaa waliin isaan hordofe; galaanicha irraa wanti isaan haguuge isaan haguuge.
arabic: فَأَتۡبَعَهُمۡ فِرۡعَوۡنُ بِجُنُودِهِۦ فَغَشِيَهُم مِّنَ ٱلۡيَمِّ مَا غَشِيَهُمۡ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: fa-atbaʿahum fir'ʿawnu bijunūdihi faghashiyahum mina al-yami mā ghashiyahum
